name: pkce-client
description: OAuth2 Authorization Code Flow with PKCE from the command line

scripts.pkce-okta: node pkce-client --client_id 0oar16ap61JZJIbYp356 --idp_org https://dev-532307.okta.com/oauth2/default/v1 --scopes "openid profile email offline_access" --redirect_uri http://localhost:8080/redirect
scripts.pkce-adfs: node pkce-client --client_id bd4a073a-9ba0-44e0-afa6-51387f9b1da0 --idp_org https://40.114.125.54/adfs/oauth2  --scopes "openid profile email" --redirect_uri http://localhost:8080/redirect
scripts.pkce-adfs-com: node pkce-client --client_id 1a7b542f-2c84-4dab-9b21-547975cd948f --idp_org https://login.microsoftonline.com/common/oauth2 --user_org https://login.microsoftonline.com/common/openid --scopes "openid profile email encompass_api" --redirect_uri http://localhost:8080/redirect
scripts.pkce-sfdc-dev: node pkce-client --client_id 3MVG9CxwbdV68qJKgj5WWgveAZvneifOHmHzoA_CbLrVRwfDDgl.7QOZM1Lr5EAYWiFO.o.rfVk.3KcVm97TX --idp_org https://dev-gehc.cs97.force.com/geidp/services/oauth2 --scopes "openid api refresh_token offline_access" --redirect_uri http://localhost:8080/redirect
scripts.pkce-sfdc-uat: node pkce-client --client_id 3MVG9CxwbdV68qJKgj5WWgveAZvneifOHmHzoA_CbLrVRwfDDgl.7QOZM1Lr5EAYWiFO.o.rfVk.3KcVm97TX --idp_org https://uat1-gehc.cs94.force.com/geidp/services/oauth2 --scopes "openid api refresh_token offline_access" --redirect_uri http://localhost:8080/redirect
scripts.pkce-sfdc-prd: node pkce-client --client_id 3MVG9CxwbdV68qJKgj5WWgveAZvneifOHmHzoA_CbLrVRwfDDgl.7QOZM1Lr5EAYWiFO.o.rfVk.3KcVm97TX --idp_org https://gehealthcare-amer.my.salesforce.com/services/oauth2 --scopes "openid api refresh_token offline_access" --redirect_uri http://localhost:8080/redirect

author: Brian Rafalowski
